languages.text: "Есть разница между "не безгрешна" и "погрязла в ереси", {name}. Первое можно искупить праведными деяниями и служением, второе же — лишь выжечь очистительным пламенем".

"There is a difference between 'not without transgression' and 'steeped in heresy,' {name}. The former can be atoned for by righteous deeds and service. The latter can only be burned away by cleansing fire."
languages.original_text: "Есть разница между "не безгрешна" и "погрязла в ереси", {name}. Первое можно искупить праведными деяниями и служением, второе же — лишь выжечь очистительным пламенем".

traits.locale_text: "There is a difference between 'not without sin' and 'steeped in heresy,' {name}. The former can be atoned for by righteous deeds and service. The latter can only be burned away by a cleansing fire."
"There is a difference between 'not without sin' and 'steeped in heresy,' {name}. The former can be atoned for by righteous deeds and service. The latter can only be burned away by a cleansing fire."

"There is a difference between 'not without transgression' and 'steeped in heresy,' {name}. The former can be atoned for by righteous deeds and service. The latter can only be burned away by a cleansing fire."

"There is a difference between 'not without transgression' and 'steeped in heresy,' {name}. The former can be atoned for by righteous deeds and service. The latter can only be burned away by a cleansing fire."

"There is a difference between 'not without transgression' and 'steeped in heresy,' {name}. The former can be atoned for by righteous deeds and service. The latter can only be burned away by cleansing fire."

"There is a difference between 'not without transgression' and 'steeped in heresy,' {name}. The former can be atoned for by righteous deeds and service. The latter can only be burned away by cleansing fire."

languages.text: “‘犯下过错’和‘深陷异端邪说’截然不同，{name}。前者可以通过善举与赎罪来弥补，但后者只能被净化之火焚烧殆尽。”
languages.original_text: "There is a difference between 'not without transgression' and 'steeped in heresy,' {name}. The former can be atoned for by righteous deeds and service. The latter can only be burned away by cleansing fire."

traits.locale_text: “‘犯下过错’和‘深陷异端邪说’截然不同，{name}。前者可以通过善举与赎罪来弥补，但后者只能被净化之火焚烧殆尽。”

languages.text: 「『無罪ではない』と『異端に浸かっている』では、大きな違いがある。{name}様、前者は正しい行いや奉仕によって償う事が可能ですが、後者は清めの火によって焼き払う以外にありません」
languages.original_text: "There is a difference between 'not without transgression' and 'steeped in heresy,' {name}. The former can be atoned for by righteous deeds and service. The latter can only be burned away by cleansing fire."

traits.locale_text: 「『無罪ではない』と『異端に浸かっている』では、大きな違いがある。{name}様、前者は正しい行いや奉仕によって償う事が可能ですが、後者は清めの火によって焼き払う以外にありません」

languages.text: «Hay una diferencia entre "no sin transgresión" e "impregnado de herejía", {name}. La primera puede ser expiada con buenas obras y con servicio. La segunda solo puede ser extinguida por un fuego ardiente purificador».
languages.original_text: "There is a difference between 'not without transgression' and 'steeped in heresy,' {name}. The former can be atoned for by righteous deeds and service. The latter can only be burned away by cleansing fire."

traits.locale_text: «Hay una diferencia entre "no sin transgresión" e "impregnado de herejía", {name}. La primera puede ser expiada con buenas obras y con servicio. La segunda solo puede ser extinguida por un fuego ardiente purificador».

languages.text: "Es gibt einen Unterschied zwischen 'nicht ohne Sünde' und 'von Ketzerei durchdrungen', {name}. Für Ersteres lässt sich durch rechtschaffene Taten und frommen Dienst Buße tun. Letzteres lässt sich nur durch ein läuterndes Feuer wegbrennen."
languages.original_text: "There is a difference between 'not without transgression' and 'steeped in heresy,' {name}. The former can be atoned for by righteous deeds and service. The latter can only be burned away by cleansing fire."

traits.locale_text: "Es gibt einen Unterschied zwischen 'nicht ohne Sünde' und 'von Ketzerei durchdrungen', {name}. Für Ersteres lässt sich durch rechtschaffene Taten und frommen Dienst Buße tun. Letzteres lässt sich nur durch ein läuterndes Feuer wegbrennen."

languages.text: « Il y a une différence entre se rendre coupable de transgression et baigner dans l'hérésie, {name}. Dans le premier cas, on peut toujours se racheter en faisant le bien. Dans le second, en revanche, seul le feu purificateur peut nous libérer. »
languages.original_text: "There is a difference between 'not without transgression' and 'steeped in heresy,' {name}. The former can be atoned for by righteous deeds and service. The latter can only be burned away by cleansing fire."

traits.locale_text: « Il y a une différence entre se rendre coupable de transgression et baigner dans l'hérésie, {name}. Dans le premier cas, on peut toujours se racheter en faisant le bien. Dans le second, en revanche, seul le feu purificateur peut nous libérer. »

languages.text: "'Günahsız olmamak' ve 'kâfirliğe girişmek' arasında fark var {name}. İlkinin telafisi, hayırlı işler yapıp hizmet ederek mümkündür. Diğeriyse ancak arındıran ateşle kül edildiğinde temizlenir."
languages.original_text: "There is a difference between 'not without transgression' and 'steeped in heresy,' {name}. The former can be atoned for by righteous deeds and service. The latter can only be burned away by cleansing fire."
